941918071307.summary: Event Background The Africa Sports Unified Connex Summit is the exectuive level premier event aimed at transforming the Pan-African sports industry. This year's summit will focus on advancing the role of sports as a key driver of economic growth , job creation , and social development across Africa. Hosted by Africa Sports Unified , the summit gathers influential leaders, policymakers, and investors to explore new opportunities for investment , commercial growth , and sports development . Attendees will engage in critical discussions on the future of sports in Africa, with a focus on sustainable growth and creating long-lasting impact for communities across the continent. The ASU Connex Summit aims to revolutionise the sports landscape in Africa by fostering collaboration, knowledge exchange, and innovation. It serves as a platform to build effective relationships, unearth solutions, and discuss critical topics essential to the advancement of sports in Africa. By attending, delegates will contribute to and benefit from discussions on market nuances, investment opportunities, and the development of professionalism and competency within the African sports market. The ASU Connex Summit is a must-attend event for those passionate about shaping the future of African sports, making a meaningful difference in their communities, and expanding their networks on a global stage. Who Will Attend This exclusive summit is designed for C-suite executives , sports industry professionals , and decision-makers from across the Pan-African and global sports markets. Attendees will include: Government officials and sports ministers responsible for sports policy and development International Federations Sponsors and brands investing in African sports Media organisations and broadcasters covering global sports Private investors looking for new opportunities in the Pan-African market Join influential leaders from organisations such as FIFA , the UK Department for Business & Trade , the Commonwealth Secretariat , Helios Sports & Entertainment Group , and more as we collaborate to unlock the potential of sports in Africa. Key Themes At this years ASU Connex Summit , we will explore several important themes central to the future of African sports, including: Investment in African Sports : Understanding the opportunities and challenges of investing in sports across the continent. Sport for Development : Leveraging sports to foster youth engagement, economic growth, and social cohesion. FIFA's Growth of Football Across Africa : Discussing FIFAs plans to further develop football on the continent, enhancing accessibility and infrastructure. These themes will drive thought-provoking panel discussions, networking sessions, and collaborative opportunities for all attendees. Past Speakers and Participants Over the years, ASU Connex Summit has welcomed a stellar lineup of speakers, industry leaders, and influencers from across the sports world. Past speakers include: (Former) Secreatry General - FIFA Head of Development Programs, Africa FIFA Head of Content BBC Sport Chief Members Associations Officer - FIFA Chief Executive Officer - Barnsley Football Club Co-Founder & Director - AfroSport Group Sport & SDGs Project Manager - Commonwealth Secretariat Policy Advisor - UK Department for Business & Trade Partnerships Manager Rwanda Development Board Each year, the summit gathers top leaders from public and private sectors, media, and sports organizations to provide unparalleled insights into the future of sports in Africa. Event Highlights High-level Networking : Meet and connect with sports industry leaders, investors, and government officials to explore new opportunities. Panel Discussions : Engage with experts on the commercial and social potential of African sports. Exclusive Sessions : Hear from key players such as FIFA , AfroSport Group , and Charles Russell Speechlys on the future of African sports development. Call to Action Dont miss out on this opportunity to be part of the conversation shaping the future of sports in Africa. Register today to secure your place at the ASU Connex Summit 2024 . About Africa Sports Unified We are the leading Pan-African sports business organisation, a boutique strategic consultancy & Intelligence Hub for the Pan-African & Emerging sports market. We have the largest community (4000+) of key stakeholders and leaders who work in or have an interest in the Pan-African sports market. Our purpose at ASU is to connect leaders and develop a sustainable Pan-African sports ecosystem, by showcasing the socio-economic benefits that sport brings both on and off the field.
941918071307.description: The ASU Connex Summit 2024, Thursday 21st November 2024, London | Leaders Advancing the African Sports Industry.
941918071307.title: ASU ConneX Summit 2024

897181081767.summary: The Diverse Business Summit, London 2024 https://thediversebusinesssummit.com/ Connecting Corporates with Entrepreneurs: Advancing Ahead The Diverse Business Summit London 2024 stands as the foremost event dedicated to enhancing the visibility, market readiness, and social mobility of diverse small businesses. This summit empowers these businesses to be future-ready, enabling them to effectively market their services to medium-sized enterprises and corporate organizations. Step into the future at the Diverse Business Summit 2024 where we unveil "Advancing Ahead," a celebration of unity , resilience , and strategic collaboration among diverse enterprises and corporates. This summit is your gateway to discovering the pivotal role of partnerships in driving visibility and fostering innovation. " Advancing Ahead " celebrates the strength found in unity and the extraordinary results possible when business groups unite, bringing their distinct strengths to cultivate an environment rich in collaboration and support. The summit serves as a trigger for merging the concepts of visibility and resilience with the creation of strategic alliances, and the vital role partnerships play in overcoming challenges and seizing opportunities with corporates. Some of the highlights of this years event include: An impressive lineup of keynote speakers, sharing their insights and expertise on the most pressing topics in supplier diversity. An exhibition featuring top suppliers to the industry, showcasing the latest products and services available to diverse suppliers. An opportunity to network with professionals, making valuable connections and sharing ideas. A comprehensive programme of sessions and roundtable debates, providing actionable strategies for improving your visibility and market readiness. Break out sessions, pitch sessions and meet the buyers LIVE Entertainment 6 Benefits to attending the summit 1. Gain exclusive access to corporate decision-makers actively seeking diverse partnerships, opening doors to contracts that can elevate your business 2. Leave equipped with a comprehensive guide to defining your commercial proposition, enabling you to successfully access corporate opportunities that yield significant contracts. 3. Learn from successful entrepreneurs like Raphael Sofuloke, Jamelia Donaldson and other entrepreneurs who have transformed their businesses from hidden gems to recognized industry leaders, and discover how to effectively showcase your offers to the right audience. 4. Walk away armed with actionable strategies, insider knowledge, and proven techniques that will not only make your business stand out but also equip you to confidently engage with corporate partners and secure contracts without the stress of traditional tendering processes. But if you want to tender for larger contracts..... 5. Our roundtable workshops and expert insights will equip you with the strategies to excel in negotiations and procurement processes. And lastly... 6. Develop a growth-oriented mindset to move from consumer to commercial conversations with confidence and finesse. Learn to navigate negotiations, articulate your value, and influence corporate partners effectively, leading to more successful and fruitful business interactions. WHAT HAPPENED LAST YEAR? The Summit has been a catalyst for tangible business growth, with numerous attendees securing funding, contracts, and collaborations as a direct result of their participation. Not only that, 11 attendees joined accelerators with our sponsors and corporate partners. These achievements underscore the Summit's role in bridging the gap between diverse business owners and the broader corporate world, offering a platform where opportunities were not just discussed but realized. A notable impact of the Summit and subsequent corporate masterminds, has been the increase in visibility for many of its participants. Several attendees have been invited to speak at other industry events , sharing their knowledge and experiences gained from the Summit masterclassess and roundtables. Others have secured training contracts, further demonstrating the value of the expertise shared and connections made during the event. The effects of The Diverse Business Summit 2023 have been far-reaching. Beyond the immediate business benefits, the event has fostered a sense of community and solidarity among diverse business owners and corporate representatives. This community continues to support and uplift its members, promoting diversity, inclusion, and innovation in the business world at large. 982436633417.summary: About the Summit: The Euro-Africa Climate Emergency Summit 2025 organized by the British Climate Advisory Council , is a testament to unity in the face of adversity, had its humble origins in a pivotal moment of global realization. Faced with the growing specter of climate change and its devastating impact on both continents, visionary leaders from Europe and Africa gathered to initiate an unprecedented alliance. The Summit emerged as a beacon of hope, driven by a shared commitment to combating the climate crisis. It began as a humble idea, nurtured by passionate environmentalists, scientists, and policymakers who recognized the urgency of the situation. With unwavering dedication, they transformed this vision into a reality, setting the stage for an ongoing climate action movement. Summit's Theme: From Dialogue to Action: Euro-African Commitment to a Sustainable World The mission of the summit is to: Encouraging Innovation and Technology Transfer Mobilizing Financial Resources Enhancing Climate Resilience Empowering third world counteries Venue: CentrEd at ExCeL London - 1 Western Gateway, London, England, E16 1XL Date: Febuary 21st - 23rd, 2025. Who Can Attend: Climate Activists Government NGOs Press General Populace Summit Fees: GBP 200 Visa & Immigration To attend this vital event, there are specific steps you must take to ensure your entry into the United Kingdom. Step One: Visa Requirements Before making any travel plans, it is essential to determine whether you require a Visitors Visa to enter the United Kingdom. Most international delegates will need a visitor visa to attend the summit. To check if you need a visa, please visit the official UK government website: UK Visa Information Step Two: Official Letter of Invitation To apply for a visitor visa, you will need an official Letter of Invitation from the Euro-Africa Climate Emergency Summit organizers. Please be aware that the invitation letter can only be issued after full payment of registration fees. While the invitation letter is not a guarantee that your visa will be approved, we have established strong relationships with the UK government to streamline the visa processing for all registered and eligible international delegates attending the summit. Our goal is to make the visa acquisition process as smooth and efficient as possible, and we will continue to collaborate with the UK authorities to ensure that all attendees can participate in this crucial event. It is important to note that all expenses related to your visa processing and participation in the summit are the sole responsibility of you the delegate. Registration fees are non-refundable and tickets can only be transferred to another delegate recommended by the original attendee. Invitation Letter Details: During your ticket purchase process, we will request the following details to provide you with customized invitation letters, which will be notarized by our immigration lawyers. These letters should be submitted to the UK embassy in your respective locations: Name Date of Birth Passport Number Date of Issue Date of Expiry Residential Address Phone Number Email Address For all inquiries regarding visa invitation letters and assistance, please reach out to us at immigration@eces2024.com. In cases where a copy of your passport is required, kindly send it to the same email address. All communications and correspondence concerning immigration matters will be conducted exclusively through immigration@eces2024.com We look forward to welcoming you to the Euro-Afric Climate Emergency Summit in London and hope that this guide helps you navigate the visa and immigration process effectively. If you have any further questions or require assistance, please do not hesitate to contact us at immigration@eces2024.com Safe travels, and we are excited to have you join us at this critical event in London! Accommodation & Meals While accommodation arrangements are your responsibility, we are pleased to inform you that complimentary breakfast and lunch will be provided to all attendees. These meals will be offered free of charge, ensuring that you can focus on the conference sessions without worrying about your dining needs. C ontact Us: L ivechat : www.eces2024.com Phone: +44 20 8040 3353 Email: info@eces2024.com Website: www.eces2024.com
982436633417.description: This summit is your opportunity to be part of the change-makers driving climate Action across Europe and Africa.
982436633417.title: Euro-Africa Climate Emergency Summit 2025

954388831687.summary: Building on the achievements of previous years, the Aspiring Heads (AH) Summit 2024 aims to elevate its impact by placing a stronger emphasis on the pivotal theme of partnership. Under the banner "Partnerships for Progress," this day-long gathering will bring together educational leaders, stakeholders, influential figures and supporters to delve into and strengthen collaborative initiatives aimed at tackling systemic challenges within the education sector. What to Expect: Inspiring Keynote Addresses: Hear from renowned educational leaders and influential figures who will share their insights and experiences in creating impactful partnerships. Engaging Panel Discussions: Participate in dynamic discussions featuring experts who will delve into successful collaborations and their role in driving meaningful changes in education. Interactive Workshops: Take part in hands-on workshops designed to equip you with practical tools and strategies for building and sustaining effective partnerships. Networking Opportunities: Connect with like-minded professionals, share ideas, and form new partnerships to enhance your impact in the education sector. Food and Refreshments Provided: Enjoy complimentary refreshments, including a light breakfast and lunch, as you engage in stimulating conversations and activities throughout the day. Why Attend: Learn Best Practices: Discover successful examples of collaborations and gain insights into best practices for creating impactful partnerships. Build Connections: Network with educational leaders, stakeholders, and influencers who are committed to improving education. Collaborate for Change: Engage in meaningful discussions and activities that will help you contribute to systemic improvements in education. Explore how AH's initiatives are driving positive change and how you can be part of this transformative journey. Meet Our Keynote Speakers and Panellists : The AH Summit 2024 brings together trailblazing leaders, educators, and changemakers who are redefining the landscape of education, leadership, and community empowerment. From award-winning founders to transformational CEOs, our speakers have not only shaped their fields but have driven lasting, systemic change across sectors. Each keynote speaker and panellist embodies the spirit of Partnerships for Progress , offering powerful insights, experiences, and strategies to inspire new approaches to leadership and collaborative growth. Together, they represent the future of educational leadership, social equity, and transformative progress. Keynote Speakers Sayce Holmes-Lewis Sayce Holmes-Lewis is the dynamic CEO of Mentivity, a mentoring organisation dedicated to education, youth empowerment, racial equity, and social justice. In 2023, his visionary leadership secured over 1.25 million in investments for Mentivity, demonstrating his ability to attract significant financial support to fuel his mission. His expertise has also led to groundbreaking collaborations with global giants like Goldman Sachs, Spotify, and Sky, harnessing their resources for impactful community empowerment and meaningful social change. Sayces influential network includes relationships with key figures such as the Mayor of London, Sadiq Khan, MOPAC, the VRU, and local authorities. As the youngest member on MOPACs London Policing Board, he is pioneering systemic reforms aimed at creating safer communities and enhancing police accountability. His numerous accolades include 'Most Inspirational Person of the Year' at the 2022 MBCC Awards and being named one of HSBC UKs "Top 25 Black Entrepreneurs to Watch in 2024. Francesca Brown Francesca Brown is one of the UK's most influential figures in sport, using her expertise in football and lived experiences to uplift girls and young women from marginalised communities. As the CEO and founder of Goals4Girls, a development programme designed to empower the next generation through football and mentorship, Francescas impact in sport for development has been recognised globally. She has been honoured by HRH King Charles with the Prince's Trust Pride of Britain Award for her outstanding contributions to youth empowerment. Francesca holds a UEFA football coaching licence and has significantly impacted underserved communities across London. She is also a global advocate for sports therapy and mental health, drawing from personal experiences, including overcoming depression after a career-ending injury at 16. Navdeep Sanghara Navdeep Sanghara is the CEO of The Woodland Academy Trust and has built her career around fostering inclusive and supportive learning environments. Her journey from teaching assistant to headteacher and now CEO reflects her commitment to ambition, equity, and excellence in education. Navs leadership focuses on creating high-quality professional development and building strong relationships within school communities. As a Trustee for STEP Multi-Academy Trust, Nav believes in the power of collaboration and partnerships to amplify positive outcomes for students across the educational sector. David Hermitt Canon David Hermitt is the Managing Director of Enjoy Education Services and has over 35 years of experience as a strategic leader in schools. He retired as founding CEO of a large MAT in Cheshire, growing it from one school to eight, and has extensive experience in school leadership, inspections, and racial justice activism. In 2024, David became a Canon of Chester Cathedral and continues to influence educational reform and community leadership. Panelists Naomi Evans Naomi Evans is an experienced educator, author, and speaker with over 20 years of experience in UK state schools. Currently serving as the Head of Diversity, Equity, and Inclusion at a large secondary school in Kent, Naomi is also the co-founder and Director of Education for Everyday Racism. She has co-authored two impactful books and is leading a national campaign to make racial literacy training mandatory for all teachers. Laura McPhee Laura McPhee is the Director of Education at University Schools Trust and an experienced headteacher with a passion for social justice and educational reform. Laura has a proven track record of raising standards in areas of high deprivation and is a published author, keynote speaker, and consultant. Her pro bono work with social justice charity Nacro further highlights her commitment to driving educational and societal change. Hussein Hussein Hussein Hussein is the CEO and founder of CAPE Mentors, an award-winning charity providing impactful mentoring and tuition. His personal experiences growing up in London inform his approach to education and social equity, and his work with young people continues to make a significant difference in the lives of those from disadvantaged backgrounds. Elaine Cunningham-Walker Elaine Cunningham-Walker started an Education Agency to provide the right pathways for children to thrive. She has won numerous awards for her impact both in the UK and internationally. Through her work in education and events for organisations, she continues to source talent and create opportunities for young people, ensuring they have the tools they need to succeed. This event welcomes individuals from all sectors, nationalities, and backgrounds. Dont miss this opportunity to be part of a transformative event that aims to strengthen educational partnerships for systemic change. Reserve your spot today and join us in making a lasting impact on the education sector. Register Now! For more information, please contact us at summit@aspiringheads.com
954388831687.description: Join us to explore and strengthen partnerships in education for systemic change. Keynotes, workshops, and networking included!
954388831687.title: AH Summit 2024: Partnerships for Progress

1036614420637.summary: Nearly half of UK adults have reported having a fetish or kink, according to a recent study. Despite their commonality, these topics remain heavily stigmatised and misunderstood. The Fetish & Kink Summit aims to create a safe space to foster greater awareness and understanding of the diverse ways people experience and express fetishism and kink. By attending this event, you'll connect with like-minded individuals who share similar interests and experiences. You'll also have the opportunity to engage with world-renowned experts, gaining valuable insights into the psychological and social facets of the world of kink. Whether you're just beginning to explore these practices or have years of experience, this is a unique chance to expand your knowledge and challenge assumptions in a diverse and inclusive environment. Talks and workshops include: The Psychology of Fetish & Kink An exploration of Power, Play & Pleasure Kinky Relationships: Etiquette & Empowerment Consent workshop Mental Health in Kink A panel discussion on Identity & Intersectionality in Kink
1036614420637.description: A one-day series of talks, workshops and Q&As from world-leading experts
1036614420637.title: The Fetish & Kink Summit - London

944964483207.summary: The East Herts, Essex, Beds & MK Science Hub are excited to offer schools the opportunity to attend our KS3 Climate Change Student Summit. This summit will bring together local and national partners from across the education, research and the wider STEM sectors to enhance teacher and student understanding of the science and implications of climate change. The aim of the summit is to highlight to young people and their teachers the challenges we face but also focus on what possible solutions there are and new future technologies that can help. Note : Places are limited and will be allocated on a first come first served basis. We'd like as many schools to benefit from this exciting opportunity as possible and so schools are limited to 1 teacher and a maximum of 10 students.
944964483207.description: A full day summit to enhance teacher and KS3 students understanding of the science and implications of climate change.
944964483207.title: KS3 student climate change summit Herts

1004763032277.summary: Building the Excellent Family (BEF) Summit Empowering Families, Shaping Futures This Years Theme: 'Called 2 Chosen' The theme for this year, " Called 2 Chosen," invites an exploration of our innate gifts and the profound act of stepping into our true potential. It speaks to distinguishing oneself, owning one's opportunities, and truly standing out from the crowd in a world that increasingly demands distinction and purpose driven living. Since its inception in 2019, Cedarcube has dedicated itself to empowering families and individuals preparing for family life. As Cedarcubes flagship summit, the BEF focuses on the pillars of empowerment, alongside healing, bonding, and connecting integral aspects of a balanced life. Our mission is to address macro societal issues at the micro level of the family, the cornerstone of society, guided by a core ethos rooted in the Word of God. A Transformative Experience: Attendees of the BEF summit embark on a transformative journey, gaining invaluable tools to enhance their health and well-being, parenting skills, financial acumen, relationships, and spiritual purpose. Each year, we create an oasis of learning and inspiration amidst the chaos of our times, helping individuals forge a vision of an enhanced life and family dynamics. Exclusive Access and Book Launch: This year, every ticket gives you exclusive access to the launch of Ihu's highly anticipated book, The Awakening of Purpose through Passion and Pain . Each attendee will receive a signed paperback copy of the book, while VIPs will be gifted a signed hardback copy. Meet the Esteemed Speakers for the Event : Past Distinguished Speakers: Our summit has been graced by world-renowned experts including: Philip Chan , the late #1 ten-second math expert globally. Chanel, for Caroline Marsh Success Secret of Millionaires. Teemak Phoenix , influential social media voice. Wai-Yee Schmidt , investment strategist. Professor Chris Imafidon , Guinness world record holder and patriarch of the UK's smartest family. Sabrina Ben Salmi and her children, the Fabulous 5, embodying influence and inspiration. This years event is no different as we have gathered experts in business, finance, health, relationship, parenting and ministry to ensure this is the one must attend to event to summise your 2024 and prepare you and your family for a soaring 2025. Join us at the BEF summit to not just envision but actively create a better future for yourself and your family. Embrace the call to rise above and be chosen for greatness. Sponsorship: Sponsorship opportunities are available. Please contact us via our email address info@cedarcube.com .
1004763032277.description: Join us at "Building the Excellent Family 2024" themed Called 2 Chosen event to strengthen family bonds and grow together!
1004763032277.title: Building the Excellent Family 2024 "Called2Chosen"

1010651645277.summary: Join us for the Guildford.Games Developer Summit , a brand-new, exclusive B2B event designed specifically for studio founders, leaders, and aspiring devs looking to take their business to the next level. Enjoy complimentary food and hot drinks and network with other games industry leaders and visionaries! Running alongside the Guildford.Games Festival, this Summit is your opportunity to deep dive into the business side of game development and learn from industry pros. Expect invaluable sessions on: Funding and Pitching : Master the art of securing funding and creating killer pitches that attract investors. Business Strategy : Learn how to craft effective business plans, grow your studio, and manage a successful team. Industry Trends : Stay ahead of the curve with insights on the latest innovations and emerging trends in gaming. Soft Skills Development : Elevate your leadership, communication, and management skills to ensure your studios long-term success. We have plenty of exciting speaker + more announcements to make in the coming months! Who Should Attend? This Summit is tailored for studio founders, leaders, and devs looking to gain essential business knowledge, connect with other industry professionals, and grow their careers. Tickets: - 50 for GU postcode studios - 95 for attendees from outside the area If youre a micro-studio and feel the ticket price is a barrier, reach out to us at hello@guildford.games were committed to making the Dev Summit accessible to as many studios as possible. Dont miss this chance to power up your skills and network with the best in the business at the guildford.games Dev Summit!
1010651645277.description: Join the guildford.games Developer Summit for essential insights on funding, business strategy and industry trends.
1010651645277.title: guildford.games: Developer Summit

939525866157.summary: A unique one-day event bringing together built environment professionals, developers and investors from across the country for a day of networking and knowledge exchange in Basingstoke a well-connected Hampshire town between London and the south coast ports. Delve into the fascinating topic of "happiness" and its impact on everything from placemaking and investment to social value and ESG in the commercial property market. This event is not just about bricks and mortar; it's about creating thriving places that contribute to productivity and wellbeing. Our line-up of dynamic speakers will share insights, strategies, and success stories, ensuring that every moment of the day is engaging and enriching. Dont miss this opportunity to connect, discover the Basingstoke opportunity, and gain a fresh perspective on shaping the future of placemaking. To view the programme visit: Invest in happiness Placemaking summit programme (lovebasingstoke.co.uk) For more info or sponsorship opportunities visit https://www.lovebasingstoke.co.uk/invest/summit or contact Basingstoke and Deane Borough Council on business@basingstoke.gov.uk . #Placemaking #BuiltEnvironment #CommercialProperty #SocialValue #ESG #UKRealEstate #PropertyDevelopment #RealEstateInvestment #UKPropertyMarket #UKOffice

939525866157.title: Invest in happiness PLACEMAKING SUMMIT
